data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The philosophy of science is concerned with the history, origins, and methods of science. One ____ asked ____ what ____ true ____ of ____ is. Another ____ is ____ with ____ reliable ____ theories ____ possibly ____. A third concern is what the purpose of science is - and what it should be.
data.partBlankContent: The philosophy of science is concerned with the history, origins, and methods of science. One ques____ asked i_ what t__ true defin_____ of sci____ is. Another ques____ is conc_____ with h__ reliable scien_____ theories c__ possibly b_. A third concern is what the purpose of science is - and what it should be.
data.fullContent: The philosophy of science is concerned with the history, origins, and methods of science. One question asked is what the true definition of science is. Another question is concerned with how reliable scientific theories can possibly be. A third concern is what the purpose of science is - and what it should be.
data.answer: 科学哲学涉及科学的历史、起源和方法。一个问题是科学的真正定义是什么。另一个问题是科学理论有多可靠。第三个问题是科学的目的是什么——以及它应该是什么。
